com.radiantlogic.iddm.ldap.controls

Class SimplePagedResultsControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radiantlogic.iddm.ldap.controls.SimplePagedResultsControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Control

    public final class SimplePagedResultsControl
extends Object
implements Control
    Implements an LDAP "Simple Paged Results Control" based on RFC 2696.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public SimplePagedResultsControl create(int pageSize,
                                        boolean isCritical)
        Create a new simple paged results control with the requested page size and criticality.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - The maximum number of entries that should be returned in any page
        isCritical - Indicates if the control should be marked as critical
